modmenu.descriptionTranslation.silk-api: Advanced Fabric API extensions for adding fancy mod items, blocks, mobs and features. The goal is to make it easy for fabric mod developers to produce a variety of advanced operations.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.silk-api-: This system contains the most commonly used and basic interfaces and practical utils in Silk API, which are used by other systems in Silk API.
modmenu.summaryTranslation.silk-api: Fabric API extensions for making fancy functionality.
